name: The Journey (itch) (Fancy Fairy Design)
description:
Welcome to The Journey, a platforming, mail-hitting adventure game.

For some mysterious reason, everyone's memory of two weeks prior has been wiped. Besides that obvious issue, there's monsters all over, and a great big creepy mystery of how in the world this stuff happened.

What's a struggling post-person to do?

Kick around mail, that's what!

HOW TO PLAY:

WSAD to move. J, to Left click to attack. K or Right click to use your special.

OR

Left Stick on Controller to move. X to attack, and Y to special.

E or B to interact.

WHAT YOU DO:

Play through seven days of adventure  investigating this weird mystery.

Explore the town, finding cool collectibles, and engaging in conversation with your fellow townspeople.

Face off against the daily boss fight, and give them a box to the head!

Talk around the place, and try to uncover the mystery of this town!

-and if you fail, and you ever miss something important, you can always try to get it on the second time around.

SPECIAL FEATURES:

The game saves you at the start of every day.

Death doesn't restart you, it moves you forwards!  Death causes the day counter to increase, thus allowing you to advance the plot along.

Absurd combat in the form of delivering mail... TO YOUR ENEMIES'S FACES.
